channel.title: Mimaggia on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mimaggia on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: Mimaggia, cairo tester
item.description: Hello, From GNOME I’ve created a simple pygtk project for testing cairo statements. It includes a sort of terminal where you write statements in a simple language. It features immediate preview of what you write. Say it’s a new format for images. If you want to test it and see the code, ask me.
